name: Lucid Dreaming (AnnaGabrielle)
description:
Go back to main menu with ESC when playing level. 

John is a little boy with great imagination, every night he has strange and magical dreams and each time he noticed he is in a dream, he wakes up. One night he goes to sleep and noticed he is aware he is in a dream, but he hasn't woken up yet; he tries and tries to wake up, but his efforts are in vain. So he decides to go through the dreams to see what happens. 
John must pass through all his dreams to be able to wake up. Will he be able to wake up?

----- 

Music only working for level 1.
